game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the treacherous cave.
game.description: The kingdom is in peril as a valuable artifact has been stolen by a group of bandits. The artifact, believed to have mystical powers, must be recovered before it falls into the wrong hands. Brave adventurer, your quest is to venture into the treacherous cave, navigate its deadly traps, defeat the bandits, and bring the artifact back to its rightful place.
game.reward: A chest full of gold coins and a rare magical amulet.

tasks.objective: Enter the cave and find the hidden entrance to the bandit's lair.
tasks.description: The entrance to the cave is well-hidden. Look for a moss-covered boulder near the old oak tree. Push it aside to reveal the hidden passage leading to the bandit's lair.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the cave's labyrinthine tunnels and avoid the deadly traps.
tasks.description: The cave's tunnels are a labyrinth, filled with deadly traps set up by the bandits to protect their hideout. Proceed cautiously and use your wits to bypass the traps.
tasks.location: The labyrinthine tunnels of the cave

tasks.objective: Confront and defeat the bandit leader to recover the artifact.
tasks.description: At the heart of the bandit's lair, you'll find their nefarious leader. Prepare for a challenging battle, as the leader is a formidable foe. Defeat the bandit leader and claim the artifact.

tasks.objective: Return the artifact to King Marcus in the royal palace.
tasks.description: With the artifact in your possession, make your way back to the royal palace and deliver it to King Marcus. He will reward you handsomely for your bravery and success.
